channel.title: Can't login [317]
channel.description: well, i got ddsspeced source v1.5 and client v2 but i can't connect to the v2 client can someone tell me what i should do so i can log in?

item.title: Can't login [317]
item.dc:creator: @DbowRushedDdsDone DbowRushedDdsDone
item.description:
@DbowRushedDdsDone wrote:

Hey man well uhm, there could be several things wrong. Probably the most popular thing is your Ip that the server is connecting to. If you have Hamachi keep it open when you open the source/client. Also set the Ip to 0.0.0.0 because your the hoster (other’s will have to put in you No-Ip address or Hamachi Ip). If you don’t know how to set the Ip… open up the client then go to gui.java and go to edit and click find, type in Server Ip and type 0.0.0.0 if you are the hoster, if your a player on someone elses server/client you have to type in the No-Ip address or the Hamachi Address. Hope it helps

                                                                         - Alex

Read full topic
